item.title: Graham Kendrick - Knowing You Jesus
item.description:
For educational use.
Notes / Bells Used: C D E F C A B C (all diatonic notes)
Knowing You (All I Once Held Dear) by Graham Kendrick. If you’ve ever used the Kristal Bell method, it’s just like that! Hand out the color coded bells and tell the kids to shake them when their color/letter is highlighted!
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
